projects.name: Dots and Boxes Game
projects.description: Utilized Python libraries Tkinter and Numpy. Defined GUI elements like board size, players, dots. Created a class, and initialized functions for graphical interface setup.

projects.name: E- Commerce Website
projects.description: Developed online ordering website using JavaScript. Designed for online product sales, managing user cart items, and greater access to features like adding and removing products, changing the quantity of items, and placing orders.

projects.name: Stock Market Price Prediction
projects.description: Imported Python libraries like yfinance, pandas, streamlit, and scikit-learn for stock market prediction. Additionally, preprocessed data to train an SVM model and created a Streamlit dashboard for visualization. The dashboard allows users to select market instruments, extract data, view candlestick charts, and predict stock returns using the SVM model and Backtesting strategies.

experiences.description: Made a dynamic Web page for storing and downloading student data as a csv file. Developed an API using Swagger and a web client to exchange data between various software components. Also, created packages as well as worked on built in and user defined functions.
Developed machine learning models for prediction with preprocessed data in Boston House Price Prediction Sign Language Classification, Chatbot for Loan Enquiry, and Face Mask Detection.

Implemented Backtesting trading algorithms such as MACD, SMA, Supply and Demand crossovers using ta_lib and demonstrated candlestick testing with OHLCV data points. Integrated into n8n automation tool, worked on JSON to extract high level stock data using Python's nested function which transforms JSON iteration into Excel, aiding analysis.
